title: Doug to the Rescue
overview: From the front lines of Australian bushfires to coastal towns leveled by hurricanes, drone pilot Doug Thron uses next-gen technology rigged for his unique mission to rescue pets and wildlife stranded in the aftermath of a natural disaster. In the aftermath of a natural disaster, when resources are scarce and too many people are in need, what happens to the animals, both wild and domestic, that are stranded or left behind? That's where drone pilot Doug Thron comes in.
